description: Blue Bugloss (Anchusa azurea 'Dropmore') is an amazing plant species that looks stunning in any garden. Featuring long-stemmed clusters of bright blue tubular flowers, this perennial makes a bold statement. It's a popular choice for sunny borders and rock gardens and blooms with impressive colour from the months of April to June. Even without flowers, its dense mounds of lobed foliage create an eye-catching texture. Blue Bugloss's drought tolerance and hardiness make it a great choice for a carefree garden display. Plus, it draws a variety of bees & butterflies, so you'll be able to enjoy a little wildlife in your outdoor space.
